inclusion.criterion: diagnosis with HNC, and first time referral
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: every participant was observed for eight days after admission or referral to the clinic
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: not able to understand and speak Danish, having severe dementia and/or renal impairment (women: p-creatinine > 180 μmol/l, men: p-creatinine > 200 μmol/l)
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer with worsening dysphagia for solids and poor oral intake. They are unable to understand and speak Danish due to severe dementia.
